slowly appeared under rubble, something small mettalic
and oval thing, the thing was a sort of pod that had
the maximal symbol. Inside it the signal of life came.


--- gunthers@... wrote:
> Crotale ran over and began removing rubble as well. 
> He could tell 
> the life force was getting closer with every brick
> he removed, but 
> also weaker, they didn't have much time.
>
